title: Tyldesley
summary: Tyldesley (/ˈtɪlzliː/) is a town in the Metropolitan Borough of Wigan in Greater Manchester, England.[2] Within the boundaries of the historic county of Lancashire, it is north of Chat Moss near the foothills of the West Pennine Moors, 7.7 miles (12.4 km) southeast of Wigan and 8.9 miles (14.3 km) northwest of Manchester. At the United Kingdom Census 2001, the Tyldesley built-up area, excluding Shakerley, had a population of 16,142.[1]
